full.p: The test can be applied in four ways:
full.ul: All rows -- check that the expression is true for every row in the source table.
At least one row -- check that the expression is true for at least one row in the source table.
No rows -- check that the expression is false for every row in the source table.
Once -- check that the expression is true, regardless of the number of rows in the source table.

help.title: Test
help.short: The expression to check is true

full.p: The Check evaluates this expression to ensure that it is true.
